attributes.action: Ban plastic wrapping on non food/imperishable items
attributes.additional_details: In the movement to tackle plastic waste, it is important that we remove it from as many of our retail goods as possible. Urging retailers and manufacturers to be more responsible by finding alternative wrapping materials which can be recycled or composted.
attributes.background: Ban unnecessary plastic wrapping on imperishable items such as toilet roll, kitchen roll and multipacks

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300152.
